name: 2016 International Conference on Virtualization Application and Technology
content: ICVAT 2016 is a platform for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Virtualization Application and Technology. This conference provides opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration. We sincerely invite all the researchers, scholars, engineers, students and people are in / interested in these areas to take part in ICVAT 2016\. \*\*Publishing and Indexing All the papers will be peer reviewed by 2-3 experts. The review result comes out in 20-30 days. If the paper needs revising, the revised copy should be submitted again for peer review. All the accepted papers will be included in the conference proceeding, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, IET and other academical databases. Selected papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in international journals. \*\*Confirmed Speakers\*\* . Prof.Raj Jain,Washington University in St.Louis,USA (Fellow of IEEE, Fellow of ACM) . Prof. K. K. Ramakrishnan, University of California, USA (Fellow of IEEE) If you are interested in giving a speech on conference, please send your CV to Ms. Crystal Chang (the conference secretariat)at: icvat@apise.org. Your proposal will be processed in 5 working days. \*\*Submissiom\*\*: Prospective authors are invited to submit original unpublished full-length English papers through Easy Chair, with up to Five pages for technical content including figures, tables and references. The paper should be prepared according to the Template. For more information regarding the topics and submission methods, please visit the official website at: http://www.icvat.org/cfp.html.
